course_title: Peacebuilding with Youth:  Unlearning Violence, Learning Nonviolence
course_description: This course dissects the underlying cultural assumptions around violence and myriad ways in which members of our society, particularly young people, are "taught" violence as a solution to resolving problems and conflicts. Theories and practices of youth education that help to "unlearn" these lessons, and teach instead methods of conflict transformation and nonviolent strategies for social change will be studied.
